Part C of the assessment requires you to use RMarkdown to analyse and visualise a survey dataset. The data comes from the paper, ["The importance of urban natural areas and urban ecosystem services during the COVID-19 pandemic" by Nelson Grima et al](https://doi.org/10.1371/journal.pone.0243344). You can find all assets from this paper in this [Figshare collection](https://figshare.com/collections/The_importance_of_urban_natural_areas_and_urban_ecosystem_services_during_the_COVID-19_pandemic/5243706). Please do read the paper in preparation to answer the assessment questions in Part C.

- The dataset itself is available from this DOI - [doi.org/10.1371/journal.pone.0243344.s001](https://doi.org/10.1371/journal.pone.0243344.s001).

- The survey questions can be found here - [doi.org/10.1371/journal.pone.0243344.s002](https://doi.org/10.1371/journal.pone.0243344.s002)
